contains

public boolean contains(Role role,
                        java.lang.String action,
                        Resource resource)
Checks if a permission has been assigned for the given role, in the given resource, for the given action.

Parameters:
role - The role whose permissions we are checking
action - The action for which we are checking the permission
resource - The resource who owns the action
Returns:
True if permission is set, false if not

hasPermissions

public boolean hasPermissions(Resource resource,
                              java.lang.String action)
Checks if the given resource have any permissions set for any role for the given action.

Parameters:
resouce - Resource whose permissions we are checking
action - Action whose permissions we are checking
Returns:
True if at least one permission is set for any action in the resource, else false
